blocks.name: OPTIONS
blocks.description: Options for the vertex grid, including spatial reference and units.

variables.name: LENGTH_UNITS
variables.description: Length units used for the model grid and all spatial data.
variables.tooltip: Specifies the length units for all spatial dimensions. Must be consistent with all input data.

variables.name: NOGRB
variables.description: Keyword to deactivate writing of the binary grid file.
variables.tooltip: When specified, the binary grid (GRB) file is not written. The GRB file contains grid connectivity information used by post-processing tools.

variables.name: XORIGIN
variables.description: X-coordinate of the origin of the model grid.
variables.tooltip: The x-coordinate of the grid origin in a real-world coordinate system. Used for spatial referencing and GIS integration. Default is 0.0.

variables.name: YORIGIN
variables.description: Y-coordinate of the origin of the model grid.
variables.tooltip: The y-coordinate of the grid origin in a real-world coordinate system. Used for spatial referencing and GIS integration. Default is 0.0.

variables.name: ANGROT
variables.description: Counter-clockwise rotation angle of the model grid about the origin, in degrees.
variables.tooltip: Rotates the grid around the origin point. A positive value rotates counter-clockwise. Default is 0.0.

blocks.name: DIMENSIONS
blocks.description: Grid dimensions defining layers, cells per layer, and vertices.

variables.name: NLAY
variables.description: Number of layers in the model grid.
variables.tooltip: Defines the vertical discretization. Each layer can have different properties. Layers are numbered from top (1) to bottom (NLAY).

variables.name: NCPL
variables.tooltip: Defines the number of 2D cells in each layer of the vertex grid. All layers have the same number of cells in plan view.

variables.name: NVERT
variables.description: Total number of vertices used to define the 2D grid.
variables.tooltip: The total count of unique vertex points that define all cell boundaries. Vertices are shared between adjacent cells.

blocks.name: GRIDDATA
blocks.description: Grid elevation data and cell activity flags.

variables.name: TOP
variables.description: Top elevation of the first model layer, an array of size NCPL.
variables.tooltip: Elevation of the top of layer 1 for each cell in the plan view. Typically represents the land surface or top of the aquifer system.

variables.name: BOTM
variables.description: Bottom elevation for each cell, a 2D array of size NLAY by NCPL.
variables.tooltip: Bottom elevation of each cell. BOTM for layer k also serves as the top of layer k+1. Must be less than the top elevation for each cell.

variables.name: IDOMAIN
variables.description: Integer array indicating active (1), inactive (0), or vertical pass-through (-1) cells.
variables.tooltip: Controls which cells are active. 1 = active (simulated), 0 = inactive (excluded), -1 = vertical pass-through. Default is 1 for all cells.

blocks.name: VERTICES
blocks.description: Vertex coordinate data defining all unique vertices in the 2D grid.

variables.name: IV
variables.tooltip: Sequential identifier for each vertex, starting from 1. Referenced by cells in the CELL2D block to define cell geometry.

variables.name: XV
variables.tooltip: The x-coordinate of this vertex in model coordinates. Used with YV to define the position of cell boundaries.

variables.name: YV
variables.tooltip: The y-coordinate of this vertex in model coordinates. Used with XV to define the position of cell boundaries.

blocks.name: CELL2D
blocks.description: Cell definition data linking cells to their vertices and specifying cell centers.

variables.name: ICELL2D
variables.description: Cell number in the plan view (one-based index).
variables.tooltip: Sequential identifier for each 2D cell, from 1 to NCPL. This cell is replicated across all layers.

variables.name: XC
variables.tooltip: The x-coordinate of the cell center point. Used for interpolation and output. Should be inside the cell polygon.

variables.name: YC
variables.tooltip: The y-coordinate of the cell center point. Used for interpolation and output. Should be inside the cell polygon.

variables.name: NCVERT
variables.description: Number of vertices that define the cell boundary.
variables.tooltip: The count of vertices for this cell. The vertices must be listed in clockwise order. Minimum is 3 (triangle).

variables.name: ICVERT
variables.description: Array of vertex numbers (one-based) defining the cell boundary in clockwise order.
variables.tooltip: List of vertex indices from the VERTICES block that form this cell's boundary. Must be listed in clockwise order. The polygon is automatically closed.
